title: Cambridge Game Jam 2025
description: The Game Jam is similar to a hackathon: you have 48h to develop a game that fits a specific theme (revealed at the beginning of the event).

title: Puzzle Hunt
description: The CUCaTS Puzzle Hunt is returning this year!

title: CUCaTS Advent of Code
description: Inspired by the global Advent of Code, our version adds a CUCaTS twist! Each day at 12:00 p.m., a new challenge will be posted for you to solve and earn points.

title: Cam Hack 2024
description: Cam Hack is a 32 hour hackathon for the innovative minds at the University of Cambridge. Over an action-packed weekend, students come together to design and build technology projects from the ground up.
